This hub is the **starting point** for standardizing, integrating, and publishing salmon data with shared semantics.

## Start here (common tasks)

- **I need to prepare data for an FSAR** → [FSAR Data Standardization Workflow](../../how_to_guides/fsar-data-standardization-workflow.qmd)
- **I need standard terms and definitions** → [Controlled Vocabulary & Thesauri](controlled-vocabulary-thesauri.qmd)
- **I need package structure/spec details** → [Salmon Data Exchange Package Specification](salmon-data-exchange-package.qmd)
- **I need to understand how ontology + SDEP + tools fit together** → [Semantic Salmon Data Ecosystem](semantic-salmon-data-ecosystem.qmd)
- **I need to publish data** → [Publish Your Data](publish-data.qmd) and [Publishing Data Externally](../publishing_data_externally.qmd)

## Standards map

### 1) Controlled vocabularies and ontology
Use these to anchor variable meaning to shared definitions and stable IRIs.

- [Controlled Vocabulary & Thesauri](controlled-vocabulary-thesauri.qmd)
- [GC DFO Salmon Ontology documentation](../ontology/formal-documentation.qmd)

### 2) Package your dataset with SDEP
Use SDEP metadata files to describe your dataset, tables, columns, and controlled codes.

- [Salmon Data Exchange Package Specification](salmon-data-exchange-package.qmd)
- [Term Dictionary + Data Package + Salmon GPT](ontology-data-package-gpt.qmd)

### 3) Use implementation workflows
- [Standardize Your Data](standardize-data.qmd)
- [Integrate Data](integrate-data.qmd)
- [FSAR Data Standardization Workflow](../../how_to_guides/fsar-data-standardization-workflow.qmd)
